SELECT COUNT(distinct d.id) FROM declaration AS d LEFT JOIN dec_position AS p ON d.id = p.declaration_id LEFT JOIN textbook AS t ON p.textbook_id = t.id INNER JOIN org_user as ou on d.org_id=ou.org_id and d.online_progress !=0
1=1
and d.realname like concat("%",#{parameter.realname},"%")
and t.textbook_name like concat("%",#{parameter.textbook_name},"%")
and d.title like concat("%",#{parameter.title},"%")
and d.online_progress in (${parameter.online_progress})
and d.material_id = ${parameter.material_id}
and ou.id = ${parameter.userId}

SELECT m.material_name from material m
and m.id = ${material_id}

SELECT d.id as did,d.realname as drealname,d.position as dposition, d.title as dtitle,group_concat(DISTINCT concat(t.textbook_name,'-',(case when p.preset_position=0 OR p.preset_position IS NULL then '无' when p.preset_position = 4 then '主编' when p.preset_position = 2 then '副主编' when p.preset_position = 1 then '编委' when p.preset_position = 8 then '数字编委' when p.preset_position = 3 then '副主编,编委' when p.preset_position = 5 then '主编,编委' when p.preset_position = 6 then '主编,副主编' when p.preset_position = 7 then '主编,副主编,编委' when p.preset_position = 12 then '主编,数字编委' when p.preset_position = 9 then '数字编委,编委' when p.preset_position = 10 then '数字编委,副主编' when p.preset_position = 11 then '数字编委,编委,副主编' when p.preset_position = 13 then '数字编委,主编,编委' when p.preset_position = 14 then '数字编委,主编,副主编' when p.preset_position = 15 then '数字编委,主编,编委,副主编' else '无' end )) SEPARATOR '\n') as bpp, p.preset_position, t.textbook_name, (case when d.online_progress=0 then '未提交' when d.online_progress=1 then '未审核' when d.online_progress=2 then '已退回' when d.online_progress=3 then '已审核' when d.online_progress=4 then '未审核' when d.online_progress=5 then '已退回' END) as onlineprogress, (case when d.offline_progress=0 then '未收到纸质表' when d.offline_progress=1 then '' when d.offline_progress=2 then '已收到纸质表' END) as offlineprogress, group_concat(DISTINCT concat(t.textbook_name,'-',(case when m.is_force_end=1 and t.is_published=0 then '遴选结束' when t.is_published=0 then '遴选中' when pp.chosen_position=0 OR pp.chosen_position IS NULL then '遴选结束' when pp.chosen_position = 4 then '主编' when pp.chosen_position = 2 then '副主编' when pp.chosen_position = 1 then '编委' when pp.chosen_position = 8 then '数字编委' when pp.chosen_position = 12 then '主编,数字编委' when pp.chosen_position = 9 then '数字编委,编委' when pp.chosen_position = 10 then '数字编委,副主编' else '遴选结束' end )) SEPARATOR '\n') as cp FROM declaration AS d LEFT JOIN material m ON d.material_id=m.id LEFT JOIN dec_position AS p ON d.id = p.declaration_id LEFT JOIN dec_position_published AS pp ON d.id = pp.declaration_id LEFT JOIN textbook AS t ON p.textbook_id = t.id LEFT JOIN org as o on d.org_id=o.id INNER JOIN org_user as ou on d.org_id=ou.org_id and d.online_progress !=0
1=1
and d.realname like concat("%",#{queryName},"%")
and d.material_id = ${material_id}
and ou.id = ${userId}
and d.id in (${selectedIds})
GROUP BY d.id
